item.title: PARA
item.description: score:66 Chances: Paramount Global is selling its stake in Viacom18 to Reliance Industries, indicating strategic business decisions for both companies. Reliance Industries’ stake in Viacom18 will increase to 70.49% from the current 57.48% ownership, which may lead to a stronger presence in the Indian media industry.
